changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS card( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, balance INT, account_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES account (id) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transaction ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, value INT, paydate TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, card_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (card_id) REFERENCES card (id) );
